channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Longest Solar Eclipse for 100 Years Is Coming. Don’t Miss It
item.description: NASA has announced when the longest total solar eclipse of the century will occur—and you won’t have to wait long. Here’s what you should know.

item.title: Hinge’s new AI feature helps daters move beyond boring small talk
item.description: Hinge launched “Convo Starters,” a feature powered by AI that provides personalized tips for initiating meaningful conversations.

item.title: Paramount goes to war with Netflix for Warner Bros. Discovery with hostile $108.4B bid
item.description: Paramount Skydance on Monday launched a hostile, $108.4 billion bid to buy Warner Bros. Discovery, days after Warner Bros. agreed to be acquired by Ne...

item.title: JBL Grip Review: A Bluetooth Speaker With Lava Lamp Vibes
item.description: This waterproof ultra-portable comes with a splash of party.

item.title: 30% Off Samsung Promo Code | December 2025
item.description: Save 30% or 10% with Samsung coupon codes, up to $1,800 on appliances, plus limited-time holiday deals on the Galaxy Z Fold7, Flip7, and S25.

item.title: Adobe launches content creation hub in Premiere mobile for YouTube Shorts creators

item.title: The Best Cookbooks of 2025: Soju Party, Fat and Flour, Salsa Daddy, Italo Punk, and More
item.description: This year's bumper crop looks at salsa, noodles, drinking culture, and home baking.

item.title: IBM to acquire Confluent for $11B as it seeks to bolster its data offerings

item.title: OpenAI boasts enterprise win days after internal ‘code red’ on Google threat

item.title: The Best Printers for Home and Office: Brother, HP, and More
item.description: It's a boring tool, but you need one. Here are the best home printers we have tested, from ink tank to lasers.
